mapper.select: SELECT t.nid, t.account, t.user_id, b.borrow_nid, b.project_type, b.borrow_style, b.borrow_period FROM ht_borrow_tender t INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON t.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid WHERE t.nid = #{nid} AND t.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT c.coupon_profit_time FROM ht_coupon_tender t INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user u ON t.coupon_grant_id = u.id INNER JOIN hyjf_coupon_config c ON u.coupon_code = c.coupon_code WHERE t.order_id=#{nid}

SELECT SUM(hydbt.account) as count FROM ht_borrow_tender hydbt WHERE 1=1
and hydbt.borrow_nid = #{borrowNid}
